    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3163</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Practice for an Oral Iexam</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Praxis für ein Mundiexam</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pratique pour un Iexam oral</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Prática para um Iexam oral</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Pratica per uno Iexam orale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρακτική για ένα προφορικό Iexam</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Práctica para un Iexam oral</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is an outline which can be used in preparation for an oral interview examination.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Oral presentation</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist eine umreiß, die in der Vorbereitung 
für eine Mundinterviewprüfung benutzt werden kann.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est un contour qui peut être utilisé en vue 
d'un examen oral d'entrevue.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este é um esboço que possa ser usado na 
preparação para uma examinação oral da entrevista.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un profilo che può essere usato in 
preparazione per un esame orale di intervista.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι ένα περίγραμμα που μπορεί να 
χρησιμοποιηθεί σε προετοιμασία για μια προφορική εξέταση 
συνέντευξης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Éste es un contorno que se puede utilizar en la 
preparación para una examinación oral de la entrevista.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Munddarstellung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Presentazione orale</string>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Inglés</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Presentación oral</string>
          </keyword>
